availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Military board for enrolling recruits for the United States Army in the 9th Congressional District of Kentucky. The 9th Congressional District of Kentucky consisted of counties in eastern Kentucky, Mason, Fleming, Bath, Montgomery, Powell, Lewis, Rowan, Morgan, Magoffin, Greenup, Carter, Boyd, Lawrence, Floyd, and Pike.

ab.bibl: "9th Congressional District of Kentucky,"Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documental Editionhttp://discovery.civilwargovernors.org/document/o00010785, viewed on June 17, 2020.
